title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A 
- Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 26th day of April
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 26th day april

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph
text_raw:
4. Regulation 4 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph 
(3)(a)(i), by the substitution of “an essential retail outlet, a relevant recreational 
premises or an essential service” for “an essential retail outlet or an essential 
service”.
text_norm: 4 regulation 4 principal regulation amended paragraph (3)(a)(i) substitution essential retail outlet relevant recreational premise essential service essential retail outlet essential service

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 5. Regulation 8(3) of the Principal Regulations is amended, in the
text_raw:
5. Regulation 8(3) of the Principal Regulations is amended, in the 
definition of “essential worker”, by the substitution of “an essential retail 
outlet, a relevant recreational premises or an essential service” for “an essential 
retail outlet or an essential service”.
text_norm: 5 regulation 8(3) principal regulation amended definition essential worker substitution essential retail outlet relevant recreational premise essential service essential retail outlet essential service

text_raw:
7. Regulation 10A of the Principal Regulations is amended by the 

substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (4): 

“(4) 

In this Regulation – 

‘specified event’ means an event other than – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

a wedding reception, 

a funeral, 

a training event, 

a sporting event , or 

a dance rehearsal event; 

‘wedding reception’ includes a wedding service.”.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 9. Regulation 13 of the Principal Regulations is amended –
text_raw:
9. Regulation 13 of the Principal Regulations is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (1): 

“(1) 

Subject to paragraph (2), a person shall 
not organise, or cause to be organised, a training event or 
a dance rehearsal event in a relevant geographical 
location other than in accordance with paragraph (1A).”, 
and 

(b) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (1): 

“(1A) A person may organise a training event or 
a dance rehearsal event in a relevant geographical 
location where the person takes all reasonable steps to 
ensure that – 

(a) 

(b) 

other persons attending at, or 
otherwise participating 
the 
event are organised into groups of 
no more than 15 persons, 

in, 

to 

group 

referred 

a 
in 
subparagraph (a), and any person 
forming part of such a group, is 
not permitted 
to commingle, 
associate with, or otherwise come 
into physical contact with, another 
such group or any other person 
forming part of such other group, 

(c) 

(d) 

the event is held outdoors, and 

every person attending at, or 
otherwise participating 
the 
event is – 

in, 

(i) 

(ii) 

(iii) 

(iv) 

a child, 

a person 
secondary education, 

in 

full-time 

a parent or guardian of a 
person referred to in clause 
(i) or (ii), or 

a member of staff of Sport 
Ireland, a coach, a trainer 
or a dance instructor.”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 8 [193]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 168 of 2021) to provide 
for the opening of outdoor sport facilities, certain outdoor visitor attractions, 
and technical amendments. The Regulations remain in operation until 04 May
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) regulation amend health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) regulation 2021 (s.i no 168 2021) provide opening outdoor sport facility certain outdoor visitor attraction technical amendment regulation remain operation 04 may
